firearm.name: Bell Ringer Pistol
firearm.lore: Fires small, hardened brass bells, or unleashes a disorienting sonic blast upon impact.

firearm.name: Gumball Shooter
firearm.lore: A simple, candy-dispenser weapon that fires pressurized gumballs. Surprisingly sticky.

firearm.name: Bone Pistol
firearm.lore: A crude, powerful pistol assembled from various bones that fires small, sharp bone fragments.

firearm.name: Cork Gun
firearm.lore: A classic Toykin pistol, fires blunt, pressurized corks for non-lethal stuns.

firearm.name: Coal Gun
firearm.lore: A devastating close-range weapon that fires lumps of compressed, fiery coal.

firearm.name: Double Barrel Ice Breaker
firearm.lore: A specialized shotgun designed to shatter thick ice, firing hardened steel slugs.

firearm.name: Bubble Barrel Bouncing Ball Gun
firearm.lore: The BBBB Gun. Fires a wide spread of hyper-bouncy balls that ricochet around the battlefield.

firearm.name: Bubble Barrel Battery Gun
firearm.lore: A weapon that fires old batteries, dealing explosive electric shock on impact.

firearm.name: Retro Repuncher SMG
firearm.lore: A game console SMG. Insert a cartridge to rapidly fire pixel-like energy bolts. Requires a blow to the magazine to clear jams.

firearm.name: Smarties SMG
firearm.lore: Built into a Smarties box casing, it rapidly fires hard candies or M&M's. Highly distracting.

firearm.name: Cardboard Gun
firearm.lore: A weapon built almost entirely from cardboard that fires backing peanuts. Highly susceptible to water damage.

firearm.name: Present Wrap Repeater
firearm.lore: Fires tightly rolled wads of heavy-duty gift wrap, dealing surprising blunt force trauma.

firearm.name: Teapot Sniper
firearm.lore: A sniper rifle built from a teapot, firing focused, high-pressure streams of scalding hot tea for severe burn damage.

firearm.name: Zink Pipe Sniper
firearm.lore: Built from zinc piping with a high-pressure gas chamber, firing razor-sharp screws with extreme velocity.

firearm.name: Toy Rail Gun
firearm.lore: A retro-steampunk design that uses magnetic rails to accelerate toy trains to incredible, destructive speeds.

firearm.name: Bone Sniper
firearm.lore: A long-range rifle that uses a massive pressure chamber to fire dense rib bones for heavy armor piercing.

firearm.name: Harpoon Launcher
firearm.lore: A massive rifle that fires heavy, tethered harpoons. Capable of reeling in targets after a successful shot.

firearm.name: Cone Launcher
firearm.lore: A shoulder-mounted launcher that fires frozen, lock-on ice cream cones that home in on the target.

firearm.name: Hunting Bow
firearm.lore: A heavy-duty compound bow used by Ice Elf hunters. While technically not a firearm, it serves a similar long-range role.
